GeneDef.label: overdeveloped organs
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have overdeveloped organs that accumulate fats with regenerative properties. When injured, this fat significantly accelerates the restoration of damaged tissue.

customEffectDescriptions.li: When a pawn takes damage, there is a 20% chance that some of the <color=#8a8ae6>incoming damage</color> will be <color=#8a8ae6>absorbed</color> by one of the organs: <color=#8a8ae6>Heart, liver, kidney, lung, stomach</color>
The listed organs receive <color=#8a8ae6>absorb HP</color>, which is spent when receiving damage.
<color=#8a8ae6>Absorb HP</color> slowly regenerates <color=#8a8ae6>3 HP per day</color>, regardless of the pawn's regeneration.
